trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Gloucester
There were no other sightings in Gloucester on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailson house roofdeck with 5 adult family members and 4 small children overlooking ocean and watching fireworks on beach. red glowing ball\circle seems to either come up, or come from horizon from ocean and head in straight line towards our neighborhood atop hill on castle view drive in gloucester, mass. turns dark and resembles large dark cirlcle type craft with glowing red sort of light moving in front part of craft. craft was under clouds and moving very, very fast. one of the adults was former captain in military (father 3 star general) and coments that it is like nothing he has ever seen in the military and they wouldnt be flying manuevers on july 4th evening. also estimates craft is flying faster than the speed of sound. craft is flying on straight path from beach and pretty much flies right over house and continues going in a atraight line (still about under clouds, in terms of altitude and about the size of our thumb in front of a cloud, so seemed pretty big is size) until we cannot see it any longer as it is too far off in the distance. about 8 minutes goes by and exact same thing happens with another craft doing the exact same route. another rough 8 minutes goes by and a 3rd time this same thing happens. we are all pretty much going crazy in astonishment. even all the kids are just in awe. final 4th craft comes straight up from ocean\beach area (hard to tell as we do not have a direct view of the beach from house) and this one glows red and looks kind of like a very large orb. at first we thought it may be part of a fireworks disply, but all the fireworks that we could see all end about the exact same height int he sky, way below the clouds. this one just keeps slowly going up and up and finally though and over the cloulds alotogether. that is when we knew it could not be a firework as it was way too high. suddenly it just disapeared and that was it. we waited outside about another 20 minutes but didnt see any more activity like this so called it an evening and went in. everyone has spoken today and are all 100% convinced we witnessed some sort of ufo activity. i decided to post this here in hopes maybe someone else saw what we did and has information. also, on the beach today some neigbors commented they saw it too and had no clue what it was.
Summary: 4 dark circle shaped objects witnessed by 5 adults flying over 30 minutes in Gloucester, Mass.
